thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com
thread.title: Jan LG

author: Jan LG
title: Jan LG
text: For the most part, my experience was excellent. Only one issue: after I ordered, my order was delayed due to a need for some sort of "authorization." Unfortunately, when I called I found out the team for "authorization" was not available over the weekend. When I called on Monday, the representative indicated the issue had "worked itself out." The representative was pleasant, efficient and apologetic. I wish, however, that there had been an offer to expedite the shipping of my coffee since it had been delayed 2+ days due to an error in the system.
